name: TatoRPG prototype
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS, posted so i feel better working on other projects and can have something to show/share for my time. This is my first attempt at a turn based RPG using Godot

Features:

  • Full map traversal
  • Chasing enemies that can trigger fights
  • Leveling, Dialogue, Chests, Doors (The last two have no effect yet)
  • 4v4 battles are implemented, but will not show up as the max enemies = player party size, and there is only one playable character

Intended Features:

  • Music for overworld and fighting
  • 12 friendly and 8ish enemy types
  • Character specific movesets
  • Save game
  • Full Campaign, possibly cutscenes

Scope was too bug but I am very happy with my accomplishments. Progress is documented on my Youtube, found here in the TatoRPG devlogs

Art used to build: https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic?download
